methane.Description: Methane is a potent greenhouse gas that contributes to global warming when released into the atmosphere. It has a much higher warming potential than carbon dioxide.
Methane is the primary component of natural gas, which is used as a source of energy for heating, cooking, and electricity generation.
Methane can be used as a precursor for the synthesis of methanol, a versatile chemical compound used in various industrial processes.
Methanotrophs are microorganisms that can consume methane as a source of carbon and energy, playing a role in mitigating methane emissions.
